channel.title: Armscape 562 gfx needed
channel.description:
Basically I've got all the staff members I need except 2 gfx designers.
What I need them to do is: - Make banners for the forum - Make the forum look better.
You must be able to the banner with photoshop cs5( or whatever v u got)
Here is the application: [code=abap]Name: Experience: What you will do for me if I pick you: Proof of work: Example banner:[/code]
Note: This does come with admin on forum and admin ingame. Note #2: If you abuse your powers it is instant demote to global mod and ingame will be to ex-staff.
